Title: MOSIP Digital ID and advanced face authentication verify traveler identity, enabling seamless airport check-in
Sectors: Transportation & Mobility, Immigration & Border Control, Access to Public Services
AssuranceLevels: Authentication Assurance Level 2, Identity Assurance Level 3
Remarks: Automates face authentication to reduce human error with 99.55% accuracy. Designed specifically for the African context, unlike existing solutions

Title: Epi-Tech: Revolutionizing Skincare with Personalized Skin Tracking
AssuranceLevels: Authentication Assurance Level 1, Identity Assurance Level 2
Remarks: Biosensors, Uses microfluidic and spectroscopic sensor technology, AI-driven skin analysis

Title: Data-Driven Energy Insights and Benefits
AssuranceLevels: Authentication Assurance Level 1, Identity Assurance Level 2
Remarks:
NOURID+ creates a unified Digital Energy ID by merging official data, allowing for real-time monitoring and smart subsidy access. In partnership with SRM (Société Régionale Multiservices), it advances
Morocco’s shift from private utilities to inclusive, public-first energy infrastructure

Title: Tracking student loans by linking digital ID and tax ID number
KeyTerms: Portal, Digital Inclusion, Financial Inclusion, Interoperability, Accessibility
AssuranceLevels: Identity Assurance Level 2, Authentication Assurance Level 1
Remarks: Manual tracking and outdated contacts cause missed student loan repayments. BoSDID detects graduate employment by linking digital ID and tax number to trigger repayment workflows, sustaining and recycling Botswana's student fund.
